data.text: @AsympU There was definite flair. So it wasn't so mundane as to not be memorable at least!
@mattlanza But did he just say “hello” or did he say it with full Regis flair?
@mattlanza I was having dinner with some people in Toronto when I realized we were sitting beside Whoopi Goldberg and Ed Begley Jr.  By the time i'd had enough wine to attempt a "hi" they were gone.
